Reviews.Title: Forgotten memories no longer
Reviews.Author: simple perfection
Reviews.Content: After much research and review of this and both models up and down the chain of power; I was certain the D7100 was exactly what  needed to take me to the next level of photography. Nikon has always held high regard for developing innovative and technologically advanced cameras in both the professional and novice sectors. Nevertheless, the competition is staggering, and never before in history has there been a time more critical than now for camera makers to exceed the various critical components of photography and exceed them in such a manner as to inspire consumers everywhere to abandon nondifferenciation and reach out in pursuit of the new.
